creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
inscription:
Signature

-- in graphite on verso: Beham | APG 5801 | RCXW | B151 | 1er etat | VCG1 | rslol[?] 
-- in brown pen on verso: SB8[?]
-- in graphite on mat: [on loan outside museum L87.111.1&2]
life_date: Sebald Beham, German, 1500–1550; After Barthel Beham, German, 1502–1540
provenance: [Paul Prouté, cf. Lugt 2053c and 2103c, Paris.] [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York; sold November 26, 1985, to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Death and the Three Nude Women
